body: Powerful warriors occupy the top ranks of sahuagin society.
name: Sahuagin Soldiers

sections.other_gear: leather armor, +1 trident, dagger, mwk underwater heavy crossbow with 20 bolts, 421 gp
sections.feats: Greater Blood Frenzy*, Intimidating Prowess, Power Attack, Toughness, Weapon Focus (trident)
sections.name: Sahuagin Lieutenant
sections.skills: Climb +10, Handle Animal +4, Intimidate +11, Perception +10, Ride +7, Stealth +7, Survival +6, Swim +16

sections.melee: mwk trident +17/+12 (1d8+7), claw +16 (1d4+6/19-20 plus 1d6 cold), bite +15 (1d4+4 plus 1d6 cold)
sections.other_gear: +1 breastplate, mwk trident, mwk underwater heavy crossbow with 20 bolts, cloak of resistance +1, frost amulet of mighty fists, 1,033 gp
sections.languages: Aquan, Common, Infernal; speak with sharks
sections.feats: Blood Tide*, Combat Expertise, Greater Blood Frenzy*, Improved Critical (claw), Lunge, Multiattack, Power Attack, Weapon Focus (claw), Weapon Specialization (claw)

sections.body:
Before Combat The sahuagin baron drinks its potions of bear's endurance and bull's strength .

Base Statistics Without bear's endurance and bull's strength, the baron's statistics are

hp 83

Fort +9

Melee mwk trident +15/+10 (1d8+5), claw +14 (1d4+5/19–20 plus 1d6 cold), bite +13 (1d6+3 plus 1d6 cold)

Str 20

Con 17

CMB +14

CMD 27
sections.name: Tactics

sections.url: pfsrd://Monster Codex/Rules/Sahuagin/Example Sahuagin/Sahuagin Soldiers/Sahuagin Baron/Sahuagin Prince

sections.body: A sahuagin prince is a paragon of ferocity and political skill.

sections.name: Sahuagin Prince
Sahuagin Baron
sections.skills: Climb +12, Intimidate +10, Knowledge (nobility) +12, Perception +13, Ride +14, Sense Motive +10, Swim +18
sections.combat_gear: potion of bear's endurance, potion of bull's strength, potion of cure moderate wounds

sections.ac: 28, touch 14, flat-footed 25 (+7 armor, +1 deflection, +3 Dex, +7 natural)
sections.special_attacks: banner +3/+2, blood frenzy, cavalier's charge, challenge (+10, +3, 4/day)
sections.other_gear: +1 breastplate, lance of jousting, mwk underwater heavy crossbow (20 bolts), belt of mighty constitution +2, cloak of resistance +2, ring of protection +1, +1 studded leather barding, stone of alliance (swallowed by mount), exotic military saddle, 2,678 gp
sections.feats: Dreadful Carnage, Furious Focus, Intimidating Prowess, Lookout, Mounted Combat, Multiattack, Outflank, Power Attack, Ride-By Attack, Spirited Charge, Toughness

sections.body:
Base Statistics Without barkskin and heroism, the prince's statistics are

AC 26, touch 14, flat-footed 23

Fort +14

Ref +11

Will +9

Melee lance of jousting +18/+13/+8 (1d8+8/19–20/×3), bite +15 (1d6+2), 2 claws +17 (1d4+5) or 4 claws +17 (1d4+5), bite +17 (1d6+5)

Ranged mwk underwater heavy crossbow +16 (1d10/19–20)

Skills Handle Animal +13, Knowledge (nobility) +14, Perception +16, Ride +13 (+16 with personal mount), Sense Motive +8, Swim +17.
sections.name: Tactics

sections.special_qualities: exotic mount (shark), greater tactician (3/day, 8 rounds, swift action), multiweapon mastery, order of the lion (for the king, lion's call)
sections.name: Sahuagin Prince
sections.skills: Handle Animal +15, Knowledge (nobility) +16, Perception +16, Ride +15 (+18 with personal mount), Sense Motive +10, Swim +19
sections.combat_gear: potions of cure moderate wounds (2), potions of barkskin (2), potion of heroism

sections.ac: 26, touch 12, flat-footed 23 (+4 armor, +2 Dex, +1 dodge, +10 natural, -1 size)
sections.feats: Dodge, Improved Natural Attack (bite), Iron Will, Lightning Reflexes, Toughness
sections.senses: blindsense 30 ft., low-light vision, scent; Perception +12
sections.name: Shark Mount
